definition: poetry and pictorial art/work of art combining pictures and poetry
abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
poem/CL:首[shou3]/poetry/verse
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]

sentences.english: The blending can be seen in the following three aspects.
sentences.chinese: 唐代詩畫藝術交融有以下三方面的表現。

sentences.english: So appreciating the Chinese Classic Garden needs appreciating the cultural of poems and paintings at first.
sentences.chinese: 欣賞古典園林，應先欣賞其意境美和詩畫文化。

poetic essay/taxation/to bestow on/to endow with

to inscribe a poem (often, composed on the spot) on a painting, fan or ceramic bowl etc as a work of calligraphy/an inscribed poem

cultured/sophisticated
